EmailTemplate.subject: THANK YOU for joining NCR at P66 2022!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Thank you for attending the 2022 Phillips 66 Marketing Conference. We hope you were able to catch our demo of our cutting-edge self-checkout solution. As the global leader in self-checkout, we can help you deliver an exceptional self-service experience to your customers. Our self-checkout platform is easy for customers to use. Customers want more convenience, especially when they’re ready to leave the store. Self-checkouts help free up your staff, reduce checkout lines and limit direct contact between your customers and associates.
